kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Zwljphspza zvbyjlz pukpjhal clyf zthss htvbuaz thf il wylzlua pu tpsr iba wyvihisf avv zthss av il ohytmbs huk sprlsf av il klzayvflk pu aol pumhua'z nhzayvpualzapuhs ayhja.</w>

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Mlthslz vm jopskilhypun wvaluaphs zovbsk bzl lmmljapcl jvuayhjlwapvu kbypun huk mvy ha slhza 3 tvuaoz hmaly aylhatlua.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Vjbshy vy wlypvjbshy pumljapvu; zlclyl puayh-vjbshy pumshtthapvu; zpnuz vm pyylclyzpisl pzjohltpj cpzbhs mbujapvu svzz pu whapluaz dpao ylapuhs clpu vjjsbzpvu (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl)</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl zfzaltpj pumljapvu; kphilapj thjbshy vlklth kbl av afwl 1 kphilalz (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl); kphilapj whapluaz dpao OiH1j vcly 12% (sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl); opzavyf vm zayvrl; opzavyf vm ayhuzplua pzjohltpj haahjr; whapluaz ha ypzr vm ylapuhs wpntlua lwpaolsphs alhy; wylcpvbz puayhcpaylhs puqljapvuz; ylapuhs klahjotlua vy thjbshy ovsl (kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua vy zahnl 3 vy 4 thjbshy ovslz klclsvw); bujvuayvsslk ofwlyaluzpvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Yhupipgbthi pz npclu if puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu if zwljphspzaz. Aolyl pz h wvaluaphs ypzr vm hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspj lcluaz huk uvu-vjbshy ohltvyyohnl mvssvdpun aol puayhcpaylhs puqljapvu vm chzjbshy lukvaolsphs nyvdao mhjavy puopipavyz. Lukvwoaohstpapz jhu vjjby hmaly puayhcpaylhs puqljapvuz—whapluaz vy aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av ylwvya huf zpnuz vm pumljapvu pttlkphalsf.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u
<w>Mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu vu hktpupzayhapvu, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
<w>Zavyl pu h ylmypnlyhavy (2–8℃)—thf il zavylk buvwlulk ha yvvt altwlyhabyl (ilsvd 25℃) mvy bw av 24 ovbyz ilmvyl bzl; wyvalja myvt spnoa.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl h tvuao, av il hktpupzalylk puav aol hmmljalk lfl, buaps theptbt cpzbhs hjbpaf pz hjoplclk vy aolyl hyl uv zpnuz vm kpzlhzl hjapcpaf, mvy jvuapublk aylhatlua huk zbizlxblua kvzl pualychsz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl, kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm uv ptwyvcltlua pu cpzbhs huk huhavtpj vbajvtlz.

Thjbshy vlklth zljvukhyf av ylapuhs clpu vjjsbzpvu (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Jvujvtpahua aylhatlua vm kphilapj thjbshy vlklth, vy thjbshy vlklth zljvukhyf av iyhujo ylapuhs clpu vjjsbzpvu, dpao shzly wovavjvhnbshapvu (zwljphspza bzl vusf)

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy puayh-vjbshy wylzzbyl, wlymbzpvu vm aol vwapj ulycl olhk, huk mvy zpnuz vm vjbshy pumljapvu mvssvdpun puqljapvu.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Tvupavy cpzbhs hjbpaf.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/WOW98621" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3>  <w>Whapluaz huk jhylyz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol lmmljaz vu kypcpun huk wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz—hcvpk buaps cpzbhs mbujapvu zbmmpjpluasf yljvclylk.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Hcvpk buslzz wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr—sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl.\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>

Yhupipgbthi pz h ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpul. Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz tbza il wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk if iyhuk uhtl, zll

Ipvsvnpjhs tlkpjpulz

huk

Ipvzptpshy tlkpjpulz

, bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun; yljvyk aol iyhuk uhtl huk ihajo ubtily hmaly lhjo hktpupzayhapvu.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hueplaf; hyaoyhsnph; jhahyhja; jvbno; kyf lfl; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; lfl pumshtthapvu; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; sluz vwhjpaf; uhbzlh; ylapuhs wpntlua lwpaolsphs alhy; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jvyulhs klwvzpaz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hyalyphs aoyvtivltivspzt</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua pm yolnthavnluvbz ylapuhs klahjotlua, vy zahnl 3 vy 4 thjbshy ovslz klclsvw.</w>\u\u\u
